resources.string: The module has been updated, %s needs to be restarted
Before making any settings, please make sure the module is activated. \nThe modified settings will take effect immediately without restarting.
After the module is updated, the system interface needs to be restarted to take effect. \n\nIf the scope in your LSPosed frame includes the system frame, you need to restart the phone
Please make sure the module is activated before configuring
Note: Setting this parameter will slow down the application startup time. If there is no special requirement, this item should not be configured.
When enabled, it will cache the rounded icons drawn by the module and the background color selection, which may alleviate the problem of freezing when opening the application on some models.
Remember to configure the application list ^_^
The current module %s acts on the application in the list
Replace out-of-scope apps with an empty splash screen
If this option is not enabled, the module will not handle applications outside the scope.
How to get the replacement icon

When this option is turned on, the icon of Splash Screen can follow the theme setting. However, the obtained theme icons usually have a low resolution, and the icons may be blurred after being enlarged.
Icon pack is removed, please reselect
Ignore the icon set by the application

After this option is turned on, even if the selected application actively adapts to the Splash Screen, it will be treated as an unset icon. Turning on this option can also solve the following problems:\n1. When using third-party themes, there will be icon square corner problems. \n2. Some applications do not set the icon background to be transparent, resulting in icon square corner problems.
When this option is turned on, the Branding Image at the bottom of the Splash Screen applied in the list will be removed
Do not replace the background color

After selecting "Follow System" mode, you need to enable the "Ignore MIUI Dark Mode" option below at the same time, so that the color picking function can work normally in dark mode. The other two options enable "Ignore MIUI Dark Mode"
Skip applications that have actively set the background color
In dark mode, MIUI will replace the startup mask with a fixed color. When this option is turned on, this restriction will be lifted.
If the background of Splash Screen is an in-app screenshot, you can turn on this option to remove it.
When this option is turned on, "Adaptive background color" will be invalid.

If some applications do not display Splash Screen, please try to enable this option and add it to the application list. \nNote: To enable this option, you need to check the system framework in the scope of the Xposed manager and restart the phone.

If the module shows successful activation but does not work, try enabling this option. 
If the module is working properly, please do not enable this option. 
Problems that may be caused by enabling this option:
1. The startup mask may be displayed in scenes that do not need to display the Splash Screen. 
2. If the application actively sets the background image of the Splash Screen, it may not be displayed.
Apply boot mask to hot start
Note: To enable this option, you need to check the system framework in the scope of the Xposed manager, and restart the phone; this option needs to be enabled at the same time as "Force Startup Mask"

To enable this option, you need to check the system framework in the Xposed scope and restart the phone; since this option is enabled, other settings of the module will become decorations, so there is no need to check the system interface in the Xposed scope .
You can enter APP name, package name
After checking, remember to click the save button below, it will take effect immediately after saving successfully

Click the application name to set the duration, click the check box to enable the item\nAfter checking, remember to click the save button below, it will take effect immediately after saving successfully

· Click on the application name to enter the color setting interface
· To set the color in dark mode, please enable dark mode in the phone system settings and enter this interface for configuration
· Do Please do not switch to the dark mode state before saving the configuration, otherwise the unsaved configuration will be lost
 Remember to click the save button below after the configuration is completed, and it will take effect immediately after saving successfully
The changed setting item has not been saved yet, are you sure you want to discard the modification?
Set the minimum duration of the mask
Mode conflict, please keep the application list and color selection interface in the same mode, the configuration is not saved
Long press the icon to pick a color or choose the following color:
Please enter the hexadecimal color code
Please enter the correct color code
